page.title: 18How we keep in touch.
page.content: The area is servsd by a telephone exchange within the Taunton area of the British Telecom network. Most homes have telephones and there is a public telephone kiosk between the Post Office and the Baptist Church, at the Junction of Station Road and Culmbridge Road. The Post Office handles mail for the locality, and there are daily deliveries throughout the area. The "Parish Pump" is a monthly magazine produced in Hemyock and is very informative about events in the area. There are two weekly local newspapers, "The Culm Valley Gazette" and the "Mid-Devon Star" which began circulation on 24th.May, 1985. In addition to these papers "The Express and Echo" is an evening paper which provides local news on a daily basis.
